ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | expcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | sqrecd.1 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 3 |  | expclzd.3 | |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | expsubd.3 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_expsub | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 ) /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) ) -> ( A ^ ( M - N ) ) = ( ( A ^ M ) / ( A ^ N ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 4, 3, 5 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( A ^ ( M - N ) ) = ( ( A ^ M ) / ( A ^ N ) ) ) |
